fields.description: Hi All, Following was ran against the Eucalyptus cloud {code} "POST /services/Eucalyptus HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8 Content-Length: 244 User-Agent: aws-sdk-ruby/1.8.5 ruby/1.9.3 x86_64-linux Accept: */* Host: 192.168.51.81:8773 " "AWSAccessKeyId=FVWHLUWNNXGFXSVSOTXTT&Action=DeleteSecurityGroup&GroupId=sgA9903C4B&Signature=5Bs3ca%2F%2BB9wj38cOl441uDovENGsc3SFmOgBT3XjKBk%3D&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-04-23T06%3A09%3A12Z&Version=2013-02-01" {code} The groupID sg-A9903C4B was in use by an instance i-59BF4196 , when the above call was made. Response is shown below {code} DeleteSecurityGroupType Failed to delete security group: test for arn:aws:euare::135182482975: because of: org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not delete: [com.eucalyptus.network.ExtantNetwork#4028b3d13e32d700013e357796cc2f00] Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: update or delete on table "metadata_extant_network" violates foreign key constraint "fkbdc151865dab4005" on table "metadata_network_indices" Detail: Key (id)=(4028b3d13e32d700013e357796cc2f00) is still referenced from table "metadata_network_indices". com.eucalyptus.cloud.util.IllegalMetadataAccessException: Failed to delete security group: test for arn:aws:euare::135182482975: because of: org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not delete: [com.eucalyptus.network.ExtantNetwork#4028b3d13e32d700013e357796cc2f00] Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: update or delete on table "metadata_extant_network" violates foreign key constraint "fkbdc151865dab4005" on table "metadata_network_indices" Detail: Key (id)=(4028b3d13e32d700013e357796cc2f00) is still referenced from table "metadata_network_indices". what is seen in EC2. Please let us know if there are any other questions. Cheers! Deependra
fields.summary: Response to DeleteSecurityGroup not correct if group is in use

comments.body: Discovered while testing AWS Ruby SDK 1.8.5 against Eucalyptus

Reference API documentation is available on the following URL

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/ApiReference-query-DeleteSecurityGroup.html

It says following:

??If you attempt to delete a security group that contains instances, or is referenced by another security group, the operation fails with InvalidGroup.InUse for EC2-Classic or DependencyViolation for EC2-VPC.??

Hope that helps!
Resolving as a duplicate of EUCA-1247
